title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Colin on OBJ's Trade Demands, Inside Tom Brady’s Bucs Super Bowl Season with Author Lars Anderson
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Colin on OBJ's Trade Demands, Inside Tom Brady’s Bucs Super Bowl Season with Author Lars Anderson
description:
Colin points out what fans don't understand about OBJ (3:00), why the Von Miller trade shows how the Rams are adapting to the changing NFL (6:00), and the real story behind the Deshaun Watson trade that never happened (9:00). Then, author Lars Anderson discusses his new book A Season in the Sun about Tom Brady and the Buccaneers' incredible Super Bowl season. They talk about how Bruce Arians almost gave up on the team's playoff hopes (14:00), the ultimate reason that Tom Brady left Bill Belichick (17:00), why the Bucs coaching staff knew they wanted to sign Brady (19:00), why Bruce Arians' first meeting with Gronk involved a profanity laced tirade (27:00), how Arians assembled one of the NFL's most unique coaching staffs (31:00), the similarities between Nick Saban and Bruce Arians (35:00), the moment Leonard Fournette considered leaving the team (37:00), the day Colin broke the news of Brady signing with Tampa (44:00), what Tom really thought of his time in New England (46:00), and why Brady's drunken Super Bowl boat parade made him more relatable than ever (50:00).

Make sure you follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
